name: Forbidden Ingress
description:
The end of the twentieth century ... Scientists have managed to open a portal to another world. Do not let anyone get out of it!

Forbidden Ingress is a first person shooter where you have to fight with a gaggle of demons and other monsters.
Build fortifications, put turrets, buy weapons. Hold out as long as possible!

Weapons

22 weapon units - from knives to blasters ...

Construction

You can build a base for protection from monsters.
Walls, doors, windows, pales, traps, turrets, RPGs, lasers ...
